repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:latest 
LABEL MAINTAINER="Aaron Trout <aaron@trouter.co.uk>" 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y python python-dev python-pip \
libxft-dev libfreetype6 libfreetype6-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir matplotlib
